description:
Nowadays jQuery is very popular to make web developing very easier and faster so In this course,students will get the idea that actually what is jQuery and they can understand the jQuery definition easily.

They can also understand that how jQuery reduced the code or make less coding for web-developers and make web applications light weight.

Students who has the knowledge of html,css and javascript they can easily able to understand jQuery from this course.

after learning this course student will able to deal with jQuery when they are going to make their web application and using jQuery they can make amination .

student can get idea about DOM manipulation methods with the help of jQuery which is really help to make less coding and do more effective things for web application.
title: Learn jQuery
